sourcesContent:
<template>
    <!-- Sheet Modal -->
    <ion-content>Modal Content {{ this.markers.name }}

    </ion-content>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent } from 'vue';
import { useCounterStore } from '@/stores/counter'
import { supabase } from "@/supabase"

export default defineComponent({
  name: 'Tab2Page',
  components: {
    },
  data: () => ({
    spot: '',
    markers: [],
  }),
  setup() {
  },
  async created() {
    const counter = useCounterStore()
    console.log(counter.count)
    const {data: events} = await supabase
      .from('events')
      .select('coordinates,name')
      .eq('id', counter.count)
    console.log(events)
    // this.loaded = true
    // console.log(this.spot)
    this.populate_markers_array(events)
  },
  methods: {
    populate_markers_array: function (marker_objects) {
      this.markers = marker_objects.map(m => {
        return {
          name: m.name,
          coord: m.coordinates.split(', ').map(c => parseFloat(c))
        }
      })
      console.log(this.markers)
    },
  }
});
</script>
